USA: The Fundamental Orders of Connecticut were adopted.
The Fundamental Agreement of the New Haven Colony was signed.
England: Bishops' Wars: A war with Scotland began which would last until 1640.
China: Xu Guangqi published a treatise on agriculture.
Chile: The alcabala is reestablished after it had been suspended since the Disaster of Curalaba in 1598.
Belgium: Relief of Thionville: imperial forces under Ottavio Piccolomini break the French siege of Thionville in the Duchy of Luxembourg
Barbados: The parliament, (the House of Assembly then known as the House of Burgesses), held its first meeting. It was composed of sixteen landowners chosen by the Governor.
Armenia: Treaty of Zuhab signed between the Ottomans and Safavids. Western Armenia falls decisively under Ottoman rule. Safavids remain in possession of Eastern Armenia.
